alert.note: Alert for Natrona (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 2:03PM MDT until June 29 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NATRONA COUNTY... At 203 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Teapot Rock, which is also 27 miles north of Casper, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Teapot Rock. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 208 and 214. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
